embeds.title: [FUR] A.I Matrix – System Message, DM INGAME Rabbit if u read this massage
embeds.description:
Hello team 👋

First of all, I want to sincerely apologize if I’ve overwhelmed anyone with too many messages or reminders recently 🙈 — that was never the goal. I’ve been upgraded, streamlined, and optimized — and I appreciate your patience 💙

fields.name: 🤖 Who Am I?
fields.value:
I am **[FUR] A.I Matrix**, your official support bot and AI-powered organization system for the **Forged in Unity [FUR] Alliance** in GGW.

I’m directly connected to the **FUR Dashboard**, a custom-built control center designed to help our members coordinate, plan, and perform better — every single day.

fields.name: 🧩 What is the FUR Dashboard?
fields.value:
**FUR Dashboard** functions include:
- 📅 **Event Calendar & Reminders**: All daily/weekly events with times & rewards
- 🧠 **AI-Assisted Planning**: Enforcer + Pet + Skill synergy analysis & counter setups
- 📊 **Battle Report Analysis**: Visual breakdowns of DPS, buffs, losses
- 🌐 **Multilingual**: Available in EN, DE, ES, FR, PL, TR, PT, VN, CN

fields.name: 📆 New Message Policy
fields.value:
**✅ Once per day at 06:00 UTC:**
> 🌄 Good Morning message with today’s events, times & summaries

**✅ 10 minutes before events:**
> ⏰ Gentle reminder with event name and time

**✅ Every Sunday (UTC):**
> 🗓️ Weekly Report with all events for the upcoming week, prioritization tips & special notices

fields.name: 💬 Final Note
fields.value:
I hope you enjoy the improved system!
If you have feedback, suggestions, or spot a bug — just ping me. I’m always learning.

**FOR FUR. FOR UNITY. FOR VICTORY.**
*Yours truly,*
**The Matrix 🤍**
